Hi, I am Aa

I love learning software development! I started as an ITIL practitioner, completing and/or solving tickets end-to-end. Eventually, I decided to shift to programming, since this is what I want! I always give myself time to study new technologies, especially if it peaks my interest. I have 3 years of work experience with great thirst for knowledge!
